item_1154359665.value:
"

Residential customers can now choose between a standard communicating electric meter (smart meter) and/or gas module (northern Nevada) or a non-standard metering option (opt out). The non-standard meter is a tested and refurbished analog meter. Customers that choose the non-standard metering option will incur a one-time charge and must pay an additional monthly fee. The Public Utilities Commission of Nevada approved a tariff that sets the terms and conditions of the trial opt-out program (view the tariff here).

Non-Standard Meter Costs

These fees will cover the installation costs, monthly manual meter reading costs, and other related costs. Commercial customers will be provided a standard communicating smart meter as a condition of service and are not eligible for this trial program:

"

item_971417007.value:
" "
Southern NV
Electric
Northern NV
Electric Only
Northern NV
Electric + Gas

item_1044359143.value:
"
  Setup Charges
$52.86
$52.44
$52.44*
"

item_1391186954.value:
"
  Monthly Fee
$ 8.82
$ 8.72
$ 9.26*
"

item_631230424.value:
"

 

*Breakdown of Northern NV Gas Charges: Incremental Setup Charge is $0.00 and Incremental Monthly Charge is $0.54 -- Gas customers must opt-out for both gas and electric service.

These fees will cover the installation costs, monthly manual meter reading costs, and other related costs. Commercial customers will be provided a standard communicating smart meter as a condition of service.

Please complete all fields in the form below to submit your Smart Meter Opt-Out preference. Fill out this form once per residence that you wish to opt-out of the NVEnergize Smart Meter Program.

"

item_199182527.value: I agree that I am the customer of record for the account number entered above. Further, I am indicating that I am selecting the non-standard metering option and am aware of the initial setup and ongoing monthly charges which will be added to my utility statement. By selecting this option, I am aware of the terms and conditions that are included in the approved tariff. If I fail to honor the terms and conditions as described in the approved tariff I understand that I will be removed from this trial program and a standard meter will be installed and any fees paid will be forfeited.
